00005 @implementation OJTestResult : CPObject
00006 {
00007     CPArray     _failures;
00008     CPArray     _errors;
00009     CPArray     _listeners;
00010     int         _runTests;
00011     BOOL        _stop;
00012 }
00013 
00014 - (id)init
00015 {
00016     if (self = [super init])
00017     {
00018         _failures   = [];
00019         _errors     = [];
00020         _listeners  = [];
00021         _runTests   = 0;
00022         _stop       = NO;
00023     }
00024     return self;
00025 }
00026 
00027 - (void)addError:(CPException)error forTest:(OJTest)aTest
00028 {
00029     [_failures addObject:[[OJTestFailure alloc] initWithTest:aTest exception:error]];
00030     for (var i = 0; i < _listeners.length; i++)
00031         [_listeners[i] addError:error forTest:aTest];
00032 }
00033 
00034 - (void)addFailure:(CPException)failure forTest:(OJTest)aTest
00035 {
00036     [_errors addObject:[[OJTestFailure alloc] initWithTest:aTest exception:failure]];
00037     for (var i = 0; i < _listeners.length; i++)
00038         [_listeners[i] addFailure:failure forTest:aTest];
00039 }
00040 
00041 - (void)startTest:(OJTest)aTest
00042 {
00043     _runTests += [aTest countTestCases];
00044     for (var i = 0; i < _listeners.length; i++)
00045         [_listeners[i] startTest:aTest];
00046 }
00047 
00048 - (void)endTest:(OJTest)aTest
00049 {
00050     
00051     for (var i = 0; i < _listeners.length; i++)
00052         [_listeners[i] endTest:aTest];
00053 }
00054 
00055 - (void)run:(OJTestCase)aTest
00056 {
00057     [self startTest:aTest];
00058 
00059     try
00060     {
00061         [aTest runBare];
00062     }
00063     catch (e)
00064     {
00065         // if not objj object, toll-free bridge to CPException
00066         if (!e.isa) {
00067             CPLog.warn("toll-free bridging e="+e+" to CPException")
00068             e.isa = CPException;
00069         }
00070 
00071         if ([e name] == AssertionFailedError)
00072             [self addFailure:e forTest:aTest];
00073         else
00074             [self addError:e forTest:aTest];
00075     }
00076 
00077     [self endTest:aTest];
00078 }
00079 
00080 - (void)addListener:(OJTestListener)listener
00081 {
00082     [_listeners addObject:listener];
00083 }
00084 
00085 - (void)removeListener:(OJTestListener)listener
00086 {
00087     [_listeners removeObject:listener];
00088 }
00089 
00090 - (int)runCount
00091 {
00092     return _runTests;
00093 }
00094 
00095 - (BOOL)shouldStop
00096 {
00097     return _stop;
00098 }
00099 
00100 - (void)stop
00101 {
00102     _stop = YES;
00103 }
00104 
00105 - (int)failureCount
00106 {
00107     return [_failures count];
00108 }
00109 
00110 - (CPArray)failures
00111 {
00112     return _failures;
00113 }
00114 
00115 - (int)errorCount
00116 {
00117     return [_errors count];
00118 }
00119 
00120 - (CPArray)errors
00121 {
00122     return _errors;
00123 }
00124 
00125 - (BOOL)wasSuccessful
00126 {
00127     return [self failureCount] == 0 && [self errorCount] == 0;
00128 }
